medical_history.chief_complaint: Epigastric and right upper quadrant pain
medical_history.history_of_present_illness: The pain began three days ago on the evening after a dinner meal of chicken, mushrooms, and rice. It is located in the right upper quadrant, dull in quality, and has reached a severity affecting the patient's sleep. The patient has taken ibuprofen for temporary relief. There has been no nausea or vomiting, and bowel movements have been normal.
medical_history.past_medical_history: Cholelithiasis, gallstone pancreatitis s/p ERCP with pancreatic duct stent, GERD, recently diagnosed diabetes mellitus (not on medications yet), fatty liver.
